text:
Give the opportunity to your kids to discover technologies! \
**CAMP #1** «Les robots et moi», for kids between 8–12 years old: **12–16.10.2020** 

**CAMP #2** «Sur les pas d'un développeur», for teenagers between 13–17 years old: **19–23.10.2020** 

FREE for refugee families or families at social welfare.
title: Kids & Teenagers Camp
